ygData.subject: Re: Our spell abilities
ygData.msgSnippet: I have seen an inn keeper kick a griffin s but through the back inn wall.  The interesting point was that I was still able to do my sale.  I think it s on of
ygData.messageBody:
I have seen an inn keeper kick a griffin's but through the back inn wall. The interesting point was that I was still able to do my sale. I think it's on of those bug things with the range that the NPCs notice the target. I guess they need to rewrite the concept of a wall.

Phalisha (E`ci Server)
